description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Dwellers in the Valley ... Illustrated by Lancelot Speed and Godfrey Hall. [By William Scriven?]" Contributor: SCRIVEN, William. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10059.gg.15." Page: 2 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1897 Publisher: “The Art Journal” Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001021084 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
